name: part_006
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】最初で最後の #かなけん3DLIVE !!【天音かなた、沙花叉クロヱ、AZKi  ⧸ ホロライブ】 [IhJW-YPJ-z0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'World is Mine' by AZKi, Sakamata Chloe, and Amane Kanata.
MC segment where the members talk about the songs they just performed and introduce the next one.
Medley of original songs: 'Intersection', 'Knock it out!', 'Gitai Gokko', and 'Mode-Ku'.

subtitles.original:
それとね、白いお馬さん、決まってるでしょ？
迎えに来て
subtitles.english:
And also, a white horse, you've decided on one, right?
Come pick me up

subtitles.original:
わかったら、かしずいて手を取って
「お姫様」って
subtitles.english:
If you understand, kneel, take my hand,
and call me "Princess"

subtitles.original: 別にわがままなんて言ってない。だから...
subtitles.english: It's not like I'm being selfish. So...

subtitles.original: でもね、少しぐらい叱ってくれたっていいのよ
subtitles.english: But you know, it's okay if you scold me just a little

subtitles.original: 世界で私だけのお王子様、気がついて
subtitles.english: My one and only prince in the world, notice me

subtitles.original: ほらほら、おててが空いてます
subtitles.english: Look, look, my hands are free

subtitles.original: 無口で不愛想な王子様、もうどうして！
subtitles.english: My silent and unsociable prince, oh why!

subtitles.original: 気がついてよ早く！
subtitles.english: Notice me already!

subtitles.original: ぜったい君は分かってない！
subtitles.english: You definitely don't understand!

subtitles.original: 分かってないわ...
subtitles.english: You don't understand...

subtitles.original: 苺の乗ったショートケーキ
subtitles.english: Shortcake with strawberries on top

subtitles.original: こだわり卵のとろけるプリン
subtitles.english: Melting pudding made with special eggs

subtitles.original:
みんな、みんな我慢します...
わがままな子だと思わないで
subtitles.english:
I'll endure them all...
Don't think of me as a selfish girl

subtitles.original: 私だってやればできるもん
subtitles.english: I can do it if I try

subtitles.original: あとで後悔するわよ
subtitles.english: You'll regret it later

subtitles.original: 当然です！ だって私は...
subtitles.english: Of course! Because I am...

subtitles.original: 世界で一番おひめさま
subtitles.english: The number one princess in the world

subtitles.original: ちゃんと見ててよね、どこかに行っちゃうよ？
subtitles.english: Look at me properly, or I'll go somewhere else, you know?

subtitles.original: ふいに抱きしめられた、急に「そんな、えっ！」
subtitles.english: Suddenly I was hugged, out of the blue "That, what!"

subtitles.original: 「轢かれる、危ないよ」そう言ってそっぽ向く君
subtitles.english: "You'll get run over, it's dangerous," you say, turning away

subtitles.original: こっちのが危ないわよ！
subtitles.english: This is more dangerous!

subtitles.original: はーい！ということでお聴きいただいたのは、Habit、
subtitles.english: Hi! So, the songs you just heard were Habit,

subtitles.original:
春を告げる、ビビデバ、ノーザンクロス、
ワールドイズマインでした！
subtitles.english:
Haru wo Tsugeru, Bibideba, Northern Cross,
and World is Mine!

subtitles.original: いえーい！ どうだったかなー？
subtitles.english: Yay! How was it?

subtitles.original: はい、ありがとうございます！ ここからも...
subtitles.english: Yes, thank you! From here on as well...

subtitles.original: うん、ここからも、ここからもね！
subtitles.english: Yeah, from here on, from here on too!

subtitles.original:
怒涛のかなけんパワーを見せていくので、
最後までついてきてください！
subtitles.english:
We're going to show you the relentless Kanaken power,
so please stay with us until the end!

subtitles.original: いぇーい！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original:
それでは、次はAZKi先輩のオリジナル楽曲
「Intersection」を歌わせていただきます！
subtitles.english:
And now, we'll be singing AZKi-senpai's original song,
"Intersection"!

subtitles.original: どうぞ！
subtitles.english: Here you go!

subtitles.original: 気にしないでなんて言わないで
subtitles.english: Don't say "don't mind it"

subtitles.english: Honestly I'm never straightforward but

subtitles.english: Knock it out! Knocking it out! Hey Hey!

subtitles.english: Thump thump thump thump thump thump
